text: Sinaamak (yahuud kee Yallat Agleyta haa mara kinnuk) tuugimay kas-maleelah yani muslimiin Salaatah fan kak Afkanuk Sugte sinni Qhiblatak (beytal maqhdis kinnuk) maca ken makteeh Axce-lon, Nabiyow keenik ixxic, Ayro mawqa-le gambiiy Ayro korma-le gambii kee ken Nammayih fanal tanim inkih Yalli-le, Yalli isi Naqoosak isih faxa mara massa-le git√¢ fanah tirri haa
